{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15772v1", "title": "Laplacian eigenvalue distribution and girth of graphs", "summary": "Let $G$ be a connected graph on $n$ vertices with girth $g$. Let $m_GI$
denote the number of Laplacian eigenvalues of graph $G$ in an interval $I$. In
this paper, we show that $m_G(n-g+3,n]\leq n-g$. Moreover, we prove that
$m_G(n-g+3,n]= n-g$ if and only if $G\cong K_{3,2}$ or $G\cong U_1$, where
$U_1$ is obtained from a cycle by joining a single vertex with a vertex of this
cycle.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-22T10:28:41Z"}
